{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=Velop |revision=(WHW01) |asin= |price=130 |series=AC1300 |est_release_date=05/15/2018 |fcc_date=02/16/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |type=wireless system |fcc_id=Q87-03331 |pcb_id=48SAQ411.0GA |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25M02GV |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GU6MB-12 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz 256QAM WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85330-11;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;;SKY7482I001;2; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS, 256QAM, Bluetooth 4.1, Alexa support, 802.11k, 802.11v, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Linksys Velop Intelligent Mesh WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-WHW0101/}} Sold in multi-packs as: * WHW01'''01''': 1-Pack White (AC1300) - $130 * WHW01'''02''': 2-Pack White (AC2600) - $200 * WHW01'''03''': 3-Pack White (AC3900) - $300 Model number WHW01, VLP01, and A01 are all internally identical products. :{{WiFiCert|WFA76391|02/21/2018}} Nanya NT5CC128M16IP-DI is listed as a secondary source for DDR3 memory. {{FCC ST|08/16/2018|indexme.}} ===Reviews=== * [https://www.digitalcitizen.life/linksys-velop-whw01-ac1300-review ''Linksys Velop AC1300 Mesh WiFi System Reviewed'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] * [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33198-linksys-velop-dual-band-intelligent-mesh-wifi-system-reviewed ''Linksys Velop Dual-Band Intelligent Mesh WiFi System Reviewed'' on '''SNB'''] :"48SAQ411.0GA" is silkscreened on the board in photo ([[WNC]]). ===See also=== * [[List of Wireless Systems]]
